verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_5: What you are promised is true.
verse.verse_7: By the sky that is woven.
verse.verse_8: You differ in what you say.
verse.verse_9: Averted from it is he who is averted.
verse.verse_11: Those who are dazed in ignorance.
verse.verse_12: They ask, "When is the Day of Judgment?"
verse.verse_13: The Day they are presented to the Fire.
verse.verse_14: "Taste your ordeal. This is what you used to challenge."
verse.verse_15: But the pious are amidst gardens and springs.
verse.verse_16: Receiving what their Lord has given them. They were virtuous before that.
verse.verse_17: They used to sleep a little at night.
verse.verse_18: And at dawn, they would pray for pardon.
verse.verse_19: And in their wealth, there was a share for the beggar and the deprived.
verse.verse_20: And on earth are signs for the convinced.
verse.verse_21: And within yourselves. Do you not see?
verse.verse_22: And in the heaven is your livelihood, and what you are promised.
verse.verse_23: By the Lord of the heaven and the earth, it is as true as the fact that you speak.
verse.verse_24: Has the story of Abraham's honorable guests reached you?
verse.verse_25: When they entered upon him, they said, "Peace." He said, "Peace, strangers."
verse.verse_26: Then he slipped away to his family, and brought a fatted calf.
verse.verse_27: He set it before them. He said, "Will you not eat?"
verse.verse_28: And he harbored fear of them. They said, "Do not fear," and they announced to him the good news of a knowledgeable boy.
verse.verse_29: His wife came forward crying. She clasped her face, and said, "A barren old woman?"
verse.verse_30: They said, "Thus spoke your Lord. He is the Wise, the Knowing."
verse.verse_31: He said, "What is your business, O envoys?"
verse.verse_32: They said, "We are sent to a people guilty of sin."
verse.verse_33: "To unleash upon them rocks of clay."
verse.verse_34: "Marked by your Lord for the excessive."
verse.verse_35: We evacuated all the believers who were in it.
verse.verse_36: But found in it only one household of Muslims.
verse.verse_37: And We left in it a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
verse.verse_38: And in Moses. We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authority.
verse.verse_39: But he turned away with his warlords, and said, "A sorcerer or a madman."
verse.verse_40: So We seized him and his troops, and threw them into the sea, and He was to blame.
verse.verse_41: And in Aad. We unleashed against them the devastating wind.
verse.verse_42: It spared nothing it came upon, but rendered it like decayed ruins.
verse.verse_43: And in Thamood. They were told, "Enjoy yourselves for a while."
verse.verse_44: But they defied the command of their Lord, so the lightning struck them as they looked on.
verse.verse_45: They could not rise up, nor could they find help.
verse.verse_46: And before that, the people of Noah. They were immoral people.
verse.verse_47: We constructed the universe with power, and We are expanding it.
verse.verse_48: And the earth-We spread it out-How well We prepared it!
verse.verse_49: We created all things in pairs, so that you may reflect and ponder.
verse.verse_50: "So flee towards God. I am to you from Him a clear warner."
verse.verse_51: "And do not set up any other god with God. I am to you from Him a clear warner."
verse.verse_52: Likewise, no messenger came to those before them, but they said, "A sorcerer or a madman."
verse.verse_53: Did they recommend it to one another? In fact, they are rebellious people.
verse.verse_54: So turn away from them; you are not to blame.
verse.verse_55: And remind, for the reminder benefits the believers.
verse.verse_56: I did not create the jinn and the humans except to worship Me.
verse.verse_57: I need no livelihood from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.
verse.verse_58: God is the Provider, the One with Power, the Strong.
verse.verse_59: Those who do wrong will have their turn, like the turn of their counterparts, so let them not rush Me.
verse.verse_60: So woe to those who disbelieve because of that Day of theirs which they are promised.
